storyInfo: The clash between civilization and savagery never ends.

attributes.content: Ugh, my tail's all wet.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Nothing's changed at all. Neither these filthy streets, nor this damned rain.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Dunno what it is, but even though the snow in Ursus can kill people, the rain here's somehow more unpleasant.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Hope there's a hairdryer at my master's place...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Her master's house is located at the end of this alley. Years ago, Crownslayer stormed off in a rage to prove that she was strong enough to take revenge on the conspiracies looming over her.
Now, Lyudmila has returned once more. Whether or not her efforts have poked a hole through that gloomy sky, she cannot yet say.
Possibly, nothing at all has changed. Possibly, she has become an accomplice to an even greater calamity.
But luckily, Lyudmila is still able to return to this place. She thinks to herself, surely her teacher will be able to tell her what to do next.
At that moment, she suddenly feels a chill.
At first, Lyudmila assumes it is because she is nervous about facing her teacher again.
But just as quickly, she realizes that she was wrong.
She starts to shake uncontrollably, on the spot.
Maestro!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The thick, inescapable stench of blood.
Her teacher lies face-up on the ground, fresh blood still flowing outward and spreading.
A small knife has been dropped nearby.
Lyudmila tries to approach and stifle her teacher's still-bleeding wound, but she finds herself unable to move a single step, unable to even tear away her gaze.
From the shadows wafts an aura that is both familiar and terrifying to her.
A wolf with gray hair, wearing a red hoodie.
The true wolf is dead. I did as Grandmother asked.
It's you.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: What... have you done?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I am a wolf hunter. I do as Grandmother asks.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The true wolf is dead. The true wolf did not fight.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Cazzo!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I'll kill you!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Hm... I promised Kal'tsit to only kill wolves. You are not a wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Hm. Was she your Kal'tsit? That's why you smell of wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: *gasp*... *gasp*... You know she couldn't fight anymore, so why?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Grandmother said. These are the rules of the game.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: And now, she's out.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I have to go. There are other wolves here. I have to find them.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: (Sniffs the air.)
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: But, another wolf is out of the game. Is someone faster than me?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Don't you dare leave!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The wolf in the red hoodie does not respond to Lyudmila's cries. She hums a fragmented ditty, flitting past Lyudmila with brisk steps.
Lyudmila's outstretched hand grasps only thin air.
She suddenly remembers what her teacher once told her:

attributes.text: 'Lyudmila, do you know what it means to be my student?'
'I'm become decrepit and weak now. Are you still willing to be my student, and my tool?'

attributes.content: Lyudmila falls to her knees.
'Drink deep of the suffering of the deceased'...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: A performance worthy of Signorina Caterina! Well worth the wait!
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: So we finally know that Cellinia, the ideal Siracusan, was just a fantasy concocted by the collective Siracusan consciousness.
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: But because she was so well-known by the public as a symbol of perfection, her existence was reasonable enough to explain away through the common imagination.
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: I was blown away by the big reveal at the end. She never existed at all!
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: What a profound conclusion.
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: After the incident with that broadcast a while ago, and everything that followed over the next twelve hours, I thought that was going to be the end of Volsinii.
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: But despite all that, here we are enjoying such a fantastic production. Così è la vita!
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: You can say that again.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: Phew, I thought the sky was going to fall.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: Who would've ever expected things to unfold like that?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: So, are you planning to move over to the new city?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: Depends. But, if Signorina Caterina's plays are still available over in the new city, I could see myself heading over.
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: A city without famiglie, huh? Growing up, I never even dared to imagine a future like that.
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: Now that you mention it...
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: Did you know that Signorina Caterina is working on something completely new?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: A new production?
attributes.name: Excited Audience Member

attributes.content: That's right. The title of it alone is enough to get my blood pumping.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: It's called: 'I Siracusani.'
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Audience Member

attributes.content: A shovel digs into the dirt. Then again.
Leontuzzo is struggling to dig a grave in the cemetery.
Next to him is a coffin in which his father, Bernardo, sleeps.
Today is the funeral of Bernardo, the former don of Famiglia Bellone.
A funeral for one of the Dodici dons should have seen the entire cemetery packed to the fences.
But, not a single soul will mourn the passing of a man who betrayed his famiglia, his city, and his society.
Leontuzzo also asked Lavinia and the others not to come.
This is his last farewell to his father.
Padre mio, how would you be seen by future generations?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As a man who ushered in a new era, or as a man who betrayed the old one?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I guess that all depends on how well I do, haha.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You've passed one hell of a weight onto my shoulders.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, I guess that means I'm a worthy son. And that I'm a sucker here to clean up your mess.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo continues to chat animatedly as if his father is still alive with him as he digs.
But other than that, he doesn't know what else to say.
Oh right, Signora Sicilia agreed to my request.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There will be no famiglie in the new nomadic city.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I guess a part of your dream did come true.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: After talking with Signora Sicilia, I think I finally understand her a bit better.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Seems like she wouldn't mind taking Siracusa with her to the grave.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: It doesn't bother her at all that Siracusa can only enjoy a semblance of peace while she's alive, because for her, Siracusa doesn't need a future.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How should I put this...? Signora Sicilia is more like the caretaker of a bygone era than an actual ruler.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The reason she was willing to give me a chance was just because she decided it was worth a try. Nothing more, nothing less.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What a terrifying being.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Phew... I thought I'd be here all day digging your grave, but it turns out it wasn't so hard.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Enough space has been made in the ground to accommodate the coffin. The last thing that remains is to lower it in.
Leontuzzo walks to the front of the coffin, hesitates for a moment, but finally reaches out his hands.
The coffin is extremely heavy, and pushing it is a very demanding task.
Just as his strength is about to waver, he is suddenly joined by a pair of helping hands.
Leontuzzo turns his head, and sees Demetri right next to him.
Demetri, you...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Demetri says nothing, simply taking an object that shines with a silvery light out from his coat and tossing it into the grave.
It's a pocket watch.

attributes.text: The Don... he gave it to me.
And now, I guess it's been returned to its original owner.
You've already apologized to me, Leontuzzo.
But, even if I can forgive you, our fratelli who died in that conflict could never forgive you.
Even if Famiglia Bellone is gone, I won't forget them.
I hear you plan to organize a new famiglia.
Most of the guys who survived left already, but some stayed behind, and they need a place to go.
Even for you, that's one ass-backwards famiglia.
You're walking down a thorny path.
And eventually, I will stand in your way.
So, don't go dying on me.

attributes.content: The rain continues to come down hard, but Leontuzzo can still faintly hear a soft 'Leon' at the end of that last sentence.
Same to you, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He lifts his head, and lets the raindrops strike his face.
You won't be needing most of this furniture anymore, right?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Guess not. Famiglia Bellone is no more.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Most of the old associates have already left. After all... it's not an easy thing to stomach getting betrayed by your own don.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Bernardo, who practically stood on the highest pinnacle of a famiglia's rule, has repudiated the very existence of famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He also repudiated many things once seen as priceless.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Honor, trust, loyalty, dedication to the famiglia...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Did my father teach each and every wise guy those rules without ever believing in them himself?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've been thinking a lot about it, the last few days. Did I ever know the real Bernardo Bellone?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The artistic director of Compagnia dell'alba was one mask that he wore. The cunning Don Bellone was another.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Then, is it not possible that the smiling, bright-eyed Bernardo who once shared his ideals with me was just another mask?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But, it doesn't matter. Not anymore.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon, the two of you, together, gave a chance for that new city to truly be born.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I guess so.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The movers will be here soon.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: None of this has been in vain, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In the new city area... Or, I guess it's a proper city now, we'll build something new.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Something brand new, that Siracusa has never seen before.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: An order that belongs to everyone.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo looks at Lavinia, his eyes shining with determination.
Each wolf, from its moment of birth, knows that its existence is a symbol of the wastelands.
After countless eras and countless conflicts, they finally selected the alpha wolf through the rules of the game as it had been played up to that point.
For Zaaro, his defeat this round was, undoubtedly, a disgrace.
But they will continue to live on.
As long as there is another round of the game to be played, he will stage his comeback in time.
To this end, he has already started searching for suitable candidates.
And almost immediately, he found Lappland, wandering the wastes after having left Volsinii.
However—
*pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Are you done napping yet, Zaaro?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Zaaro and Lappland have been fighting in the wastes for the past three months.
During that time, Zaaro had countless opportunities to sink his fangs into the neck of this madwoman.
There was no way for her to defeat him.
But, he gradually comes to realize, it is actually he who has no way of defeating her.
No thought can be nourished in her blood and sinew, no victory can be proclaimed in her head, and no meaning can be derived from her death.
She is an empty husk that has been filled.
Is she also the wastes?
No, she is an overgrowth.
He understands in an instant that if Bernardo's betrayal was an unexpected act of rationality, the being before him is completely beyond his comprehension.
No, he has seen humans like her before. She is hardly unique.
But at this unique point in time, she indeed is the only such one before him.
An omen.
A summon.
And thus, for the first time in thousands of years and perhaps the last time, the incarnation of the wastes lies down next to a human being.
He chooses to surrender his dignity to the unknown.
Done fighting?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Our battle will continue for thousands upon thousands of years.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Until the victor is decided, I will walk with you.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Hah. Whatever you say.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland's weapons slip from her grasp. She has already lost consciousness.
Before she falls, Zaaro walks over and supports her body with his own, as if it is the most natural thing to do.
Texas, we've chosen different paths to destroy Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm so looking forward to seeing you again.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: She closes her eyes, and falls into a deep slumber.
The vast wilderness is completely devoid of anything else. For a brief moment, it seems as if all existence between heaven and earth is but one human and one wolf.
